channel.title: Project Reality: Object problem

item.title: Project Reality: Object problem
item.dc:creator: @Nookumdip Nookumdip
item.description:
@Nookumdip wrote:

Hi!

I downloaded this server “Project Reality” 317 server to train my Java skills
And I added an object that gives you a Saradomin Cape, but it didn’t work so I tried another object, but that didn’t work either but then I tried clicking the second option when right clicking and then it works…

Hard to explaing but how do I change so the object do something on the first option when right clicking instead of the second option?

In ObjectManager.java I added:
c.getPA().checkObjectSpawn(3493, 3091, 3485, 2, 10);

In Clickobject.java I added:
case 3493:
c.startAnimation(645);
c.sendMessage(“You pray at the altar of saradomin… And a cape appears in your inventory!”);
c.getItems().addItem(2412, 1);
break;

Can anyone help me?

Read full topic
